examples.example: 我积极参加各种有益的活动，从中收获了很多快乐和成长。

translate.english: I actively participate in various beneficial activities and have gained a lot of happiness and growth from them.

examples.example: 我很高兴能够参加这次有意义的聚会，认识了很多新朋友。

translate.english: I am very glad to be able to attend this meaningful party and have known a lot of new friends.

examples.example: 我很荣幸参加了这次志愿者活动，为社会贡献了自己的一份力量。

translate.english: I am very honored to have participated in this volunteer activity and contributed my own strength to the society.
